headline: Franklin Resources, Inc. Announces Preliminary Month-End Assets Under Management

headline: Apollo Global Stock Up as Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, AUM Rises Y/Y
summary: APO rises 2.3% after Q2 net income per share hits $1.92 and total AUM climbs 36% on strong inflows and robust fee growth.

raw.headline: Apollo Global Stock Up as Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, AUM Rises Y/Y

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Franklin Resources Stock Will Climb or Sink?
summary: Franklin Resources has lagged behind the broader market over the past year, and Wall Street analysts maintain a cautious outlook on the stock’s prospects.
